meanings.sent1: She was unappreciative of the gift he gave her.
meanings.sent2: The unappreciative child never said thank you for the delicious meal.
meanings.sent3: The unappreciative cat turned up its nose at the new toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: His unappreciative attitude was like a dark cloud over the party.
meanings.sent5: The unappreciative behavior left a bitter taste in everyone's mouth.

meanings.definition: Failing to recognize the value or worth of something.
meanings.sent1: The unappreciative customer complained about the high quality of the product.
meanings.sent2: She was unappreciative of the effort he put into planning the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The unappreciative student didn't realize the treasure trove of knowledge in the library.
meanings.sent4: His unappreciative eyes failed to see the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The unappreciative mindset blocked him from seeing the true value of the antique vase.
